actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to require that employers be given notice of complaints alleging violations of that Act, the identity of the complainant, and the basis for the complaint.

summary.text: Requires, under the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938, that employers be given notice of complaints alleging violations of that Act, the identity of the complainant, and the basis for the complaint.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to require that employers be given notice of complaints alleging violations of that Act, the identity of the complainant, and the basis for the complaint.
